name: Doggy Gotta Dance
description:
Doggy's Gotta Dance!

Doggy's got a lot of moves lined up, so you'll have to run and jump carefully to dodge their attacks. Be careful not to get hit, you've only got four lives! 

Doggy might also try switching up their music and dances, so watch out! Don't worry though, Doggy can only dance for so long before they tire themselves out. Try to outlast them!

If you're feeling extra skilled you can get close to Doggy's head for bonus points. This will tire out Doggy quicker,  also make Doggy dance faster!

----------------

CONTROLS:

W & D  / Arrow Keys - Move

A / Space - Jump

----------------

This project was originally made as an individual school programming assignment, however I continued working on it afterwards in order to make it a more complete experience. I hope you enjoy :D
